The taxi service covers Mon-Sat evening journeys from 1800 to 2330 only and Sunday journeys from 0820 to 2230 only. People are asked to arrange transport with their preferred taxi provider. To reclaim the cost of the taxi fare, a photo of the receipt needs to be emailed to cus.serv@northernpowergrid.com. In the subject line of the email they should say Taxi fare claim for scheme reference YC27178. They should also provide their full name and postal address.
